comments.body: Is this change in the formula based on the code?

The code uses `1 - np.exp(np.log(0.5) / halflife)`.
I just felt that `-ln(2)` is aesphetically more pleasing than `log(0.5)`.
It is typically presented like that: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exponential_decay

I don't have a preference, I was a bit confused about the change of the base of the logarithm. I think the original one can be misleading, I think it's possible to assume base 10.

In any case, your version looks good.
